title: Cartify - Mobile App
description: A mobile app for managing shopping lists, adding/buying items with categories and metrics, calculating bills, and generating/shareable PDF invoices.
details: Add items with category selection (Grocery, Vegetables, Fruits, Meat, Dairy) and metrics (kg, oz, dozen, litre, packet, pieces)
Form validation using React Hook Form and Yup schema, including title case conversion for item names and quantity/rate restrictions
Item listing with SectionList, grouped by creation date, expandable sections, and buy functionality with rate input
Billing page for viewing added items, calculating grand totals, deleting items and generating PDF bills
PDF generation and sharing using Expo Print and Expo Sharing
Dark/Light theme toggle with persistence via AsyncStorage and React ContextAPI
Navigation with Expo Router and custom header with theme-aware styling
Local data persistence for items and bills using AsyncStorage
Responsive UI with NativeWind (TailwindCSS for React Native) and safe area handling

title: API Integration Project

details: Data input with react-hook-form
Form validation using Yup schema validation with @hookform/resolvers
Automatic title case conversion for names (e.g., 'jon snow' â†’ 'Jon Snow')
Age validation restricted to positive integers between 18 and 55 with custom error messages
Promises and async/await for API calls

Dark and Light Theme toggle via useContext

Mock backend API deployed on Cloudflare Workers with KV storage

title: Air Bnb Clone
description: A responsive Air Bnb clone built with React.js and TailwindCSS.
